name: ti
description:
ti - 20th in "focus" (aa, uu, ff, au, rr, ao, rl, sp, th, ki, ci, sn, lo, ba, ov, sh, fi, do, ru & ti)

Think fast. How quickly can you get through 30 cards. Yes or No - is the card the same as the last? Easy... Try doing it as fast as you can.

A great addition to the series, a great 20th app for your collection of General Adaptive's focus apps.

Thanks for all your support, I hope you're enjoying the "focus" series thus far.

Handmade in Australia,
General Adaptive
